typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ITEM_NBR as string,
		DEPT_NBR as string,
		ITEM_STATUS_CODE as string,
		CREATED_USERID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FILE_NAME',
	wildcardPaths:['migrated_items.csv']) ~> source1
source1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(ITEM_STATUS_CODE == 'D') ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
